channel.title: Conversation on Imran Hossain
channel.description: Recent content in Conversation on Imran Hossain

item.title: MicroPython
item.description: There is still a place for innovation. Last month I had a conversation with my friends about how most of the world has already been invented. And we aren’t going to see a life changing innovation in our lifetime. Look at how Uber changed transportation GitHub changed collaboration Amazon changed shopping Tesla changed cars Google changed mobile phones Apple changed computers WhatsApp changed connectivity Tinder changed the lovesphere In the past five years, things has been pretty constant.

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?

Hi there, # I’m Imran Hossain # I am a proficient and self motivated computer science engineer, experienced in building Android & iOS applications and websites. I have also completed various machine-learning and deep neural projects to facilitate different real life problems. Contact me 👉 Twitter ✔ LinkedIn ✔ GitHub ✔ Email – Skills # Field Summary ◉ Prgramming Languages ⭐ python 🌟 Java 🔷 JavaScript 🔰 Dart ◉ Frameworks 🔥 Flutter (3+ years of experience) 🎯 ExpressJS (4+ years of experience) 💊 FastAPI 💊 Flask 💞 Laravel ◉ Backend 📕 MySQL 📗 MongoDB 📘 PostgreSQL 🔐 JWT Auth 🔨 Pydantic ◉ DevOps 😍 Docker (4+ years of experience) 💪 Linux (I use Arch btw) 👌 Server administration ◉ Cloud Computing 🔧 Azure (Deployed ML/DL models in Azure App service via docker) 🚥 AWS (EC2, Lambda) ◉ Others 🏆 Git (merge, rebase, branch, etc) ✨ Vim (very Proffecient) Proficient in:

Imran Hossain # Nicknamed as raju. I’m a Software Engineer. I have 3+ years of experience in Flutter. I am expert in NodeJS, MySQL, Mongo, Laravel web technologies. If there is to start something on the web or mobile, I can get your requirements. I worked at a software firm named Onutiative Ltd as an Intern. 📢 Available to be hired… Drop me a line at ⌲ imran.hossain.1096@gmail.com Don’t forget to checkout my GitHub
